review: My son has Cerebral Palsy, diminished use of his right hand and an absolute LOVE for cooking. We've been on the lookout for cooking tools that will allow him to be more independent in the kitchen. While we have an adapted cutting board, using a knife on such tiny and "rolly" objects is difficult for him to steady and slice safely. We've found the slicester to be a great help for making things like jam and even slicing olives (as you'll see in the review).
productTitle: Chef'n Strawberry Slicester Hand-Held Strawberry Slicer
